name: Birdbird's Life Balancing Agency
description:
Synopsis :

Birdbird is BACK, and as motivated as ever ! 

Help him and his “Life Balancing Agency” in a mission to keep everyone’s daily life healthy and stable, by moving falling objects around on the Scale of Life™ (sold separately). 

Protect your robot friend ! Travel far and wide in a soap bubble ! Meet fun characters ! Uncover secrets so deep they’re not even in the game ! All of that and even more (and probably less) in Birdbird’s Life Balancing Agency !

Controls :

Move : Arrow keys / Left Stick
Jump : Up / Space / A
Grab : Shift / X

Font used : m5x7 by Daniel Linssen
Background Images : CC0 photos from Pexels
